roleset.name: laugh

role.descr: end state of arg0, as result of laughing

example.name: laugh-v: with source
example.text: `` It 's hard to know whether it was intended to be funny , '' says the East Berlin shopkeeper , `` But everyone I know laughed about it .

example.name: laugh-v: just source
example.text: Sex scandals make people look careless and silly , and one of the worst sins in Washington is to be laughed at .

example.name: laugh-n
example.text: " I was like a Chinese person dwelling in a Chinese concession in New York , " says Hsia with a laugh .

example.name: laugh-v: with end result
example.text: He was laughed off the screen .

example.name: laughing-n
example.text: But his laughing at his own jokes is off putting .

example.name: laugh-n: There will be all kinds of arg m-mnrs that appear with this noun
example.text: her shy smile and tinkling laugh

roleset.note: LAUGH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'laugh' based on wsj; nominal 'laughing' based on BOLT-6. Member of VNcls nonverbal_expression-40.2. (from laugh.01-v)
LAUGH-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to laugh.01-v. VN class nonverbal_expression-40.2. Framed by Katie. (from laugh.01-n)
LAUGHING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from laughing.01-n)
Cognate object is arg1 for other verbs of this class, which don't take "source" args, forcing this numbering. (from laugh.01-v)
The verb laugh has a argument for 'cognate object'. This is not possible with the nominal version and has been removed. (from laugh.01-n)

roleset.name: manner of speaking

example.name: laugh-v: the usual
example.text: And do n't expect many complete games by pitchers -- perhaps three out of 288 , laughs Mr. Fingers , the former Oakland reliever .

propbank.arg: And do n't expect many complete games by pitchers -- perhaps three out of 288
Mr. Fingers , the former Oakland reliever

roleset.note: LAUGHING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from laughing.02-n)

roleset.name: absurd, foolish

example.name: laughable-j: Single arg
example.text: And trying to justify the existence of god through anything dealing with relativity is laughable .

propbank.arg: trying to justify the existence of god through anything dealing with relativity

example.name: laughable-j: Don't laugh at the giant moth...
example.text: His transformation into his true form -- that of a gigantic moth -- was laughable to me .

propbank.arg: His transformation into his true form -- that of a gigantic moth

roleset.note: LAUGHABLE-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from laughable.01-j)
